00069 void TAnalyzerResultKit::initClass()
00070 {
00071         SO_KIT_INIT_CLASS(TAnalyzerResultKit, TShapeKit, "TShapeKit");

00078 TAnalyzerResultKit::TAnalyzerResultKit()
00079 {
00080         tshape =0;
00081         analyzerResult = 0;
00082 
00083         SO_KIT_CONSTRUCTOR(TAnalyzerResultKit);
00084         SO_KIT_ADD_CATALOG_ENTRY(result, TAnalyzerResult, FALSE, this, "", TRUE);
00085         //SO_KIT_CHANGE_ENTRY_TYPE(shape, TShape, TCube);
00086         SO_KIT_INIT_INSTANCE();
00087 
00088         setPart("shape", NULL );
00089 }

00098 void TAnalyzerResultKit::PrepareCompute()
00099 {
00100         analyzerResult = static_cast<TAnalyzerResult*> (getPart("result", false));
00101         tshape = static_cast< TShape* >( getPart("shape", false) );
00102         analyzerResult->numRayIntersected=0;
00103 }
00104 
00105 
00106 void TAnalyzerResultKit::Compute(std::vector<Ray> * raysWay, Transform *m_transformWTO, QMutex* mutex)
00107 {
00108         if( tshape && analyzerResult)
00109         {
00110                  std::vector<Ray>::iterator itRay;
00111                 itRay = raysWay->begin();
00112                 bool Touched=false;
00113                 while( itRay < raysWay->end()  && !Touched)
00114                 {
00115                         Ray childCoordinatesRay( (*m_transformWTO)( *itRay ) );
00116                         if( tshape->IntersectP( childCoordinatesRay ) )
00117                         {
00118                                 mutex->lock();
00119                                 analyzerResult->numRayIntersected ++;
00120                                 mutex->unlock();
00121                                 Touched = true;
00122                         }
00123                         itRay++;
00124                 }
00125         }
00126 }
00127 
00128 
00129 void TAnalyzerResultKit::FinalizeCompute(double raydensity, Transform *m_transformWTO)
00130 {
00131         SbMatrix coinMatrix = tgf::MatrixFromTransform( *m_transformWTO );
00132         SbVec3f translation;
00133         SbRotation rotation;
00134         SbVec3f scaleFactor;
00135         SbRotation scaleOrientation;
00136         coinMatrix.getTransform( translation, rotation, scaleFactor, scaleOrientation );
00137 
00138         float scalex,scaley,scalez;
00139         scaleFactor.getValue(scalex,scaley,scalez);
00140         if( tshape && analyzerResult )
00141         {
00142                 double sizeOfReference = tshape->GetVolume() *scalex*scaley*scalez;
00143                 if (sizeOfReference == 0.0){
00144                         sizeOfReference = tshape->GetArea()*scalex*scalez;
00145                 }
00146                 if (sizeOfReference != 0.0){
00147                         analyzerResult->FinalizeCompute(1.0/(raydensity*(sizeOfReference)));
00148                 }
00149         }
00150         //TODO: add a GetProjecttedArea(scalex,scaley,scalez) function to all tShape
00151 }

00154 void  TAnalyzerResultKit::ResetValues()
00155 {
00156         analyzerResult = static_cast<TAnalyzerResult*> (getPart("result", false));
00157         if (analyzerResult) analyzerResult->ResetValues();
00158 }
00159 
00160 void TAnalyzerResultKit::DisplayResult(int typeOfDisplay, SoNodeKitListPart *levelList)
00161 {
00162         analyzerResult = static_cast<TAnalyzerResult*> (getPart("result", false));
00163         bool levelFind = false;
00164 
00165         float value = 0.0f;
00166         if (typeOfDisplay == 0 /*CURRENT_VALUE*/) value=analyzerResult->currentValue.getValue();
00167         else if (typeOfDisplay == 1 /*MIN_VALUE*/) value=analyzerResult->minValue.getValue();
00168         else if (typeOfDisplay == 2 /*MAX_VALUE*/) value=analyzerResult->maxValue.getValue();
00169 
00170 
00171         for (int i=0; i<levelList->getNumChildren();i++)
00172         {
00173                 TAnalyzerLevel * analyzerLevel = (TAnalyzerLevel *)levelList->getChild(i);
00174                 if (analyzerLevel->isActive.getValue() && (value > analyzerLevel->minValue.getValue()))
00175                 {
00176                         TMaterial * material1 = (TMaterial *) getPart("material",false );
00177                         if (material1)
00178                         {
00179                                 material1->ambientColor.setValue(analyzerLevel->materialColor.getValue());
00180                                 material1->diffuseColor.setValue(analyzerLevel->materialColor.getValue());
00181                                 material1->specularColor.setValue(analyzerLevel->materialColor.getValue());
00182                                 material1->emissiveColor.setValue(analyzerLevel->materialColor.getValue());
00183                                 material1->transparency.setValue(analyzerLevel->materialTransparency.getValue());
00184                         }
00185                         setPart("drawStyle",NULL);
00186                         setPart("pickStyle",NULL);
00187                         levelFind = true;
00188                         break;
00189                 }
00190         }
00191         if (!levelFind)
00192         {
00193                 TMaterial * material1 = (TMaterial *)  getPart("material",false );
00194                 if (material1)
00195                 {
00196                         material1->ambientColor.setValue(0.0,0.0,0.0);
00197                         material1->diffuseColor.setValue(0.0,0.0,0.0);
00198                         material1->specularColor.setValue(0.0,0.0,0.0);
00199                         material1->emissiveColor.setValue(0.0,0.0,0.0);
00200                         material1->transparency.setValue(0.0);
00201                 }
00202 
00203                 SoDrawStyle * drawStyle = new SoDrawStyle;
00204                 drawStyle->style = SoDrawStyle::INVISIBLE;
00205                 setPart("drawStyle",drawStyle);
00206                 
00207                 SoPickStyle * pickStyle = new SoPickStyle;
00208                 pickStyle->style = SoPickStyle::UNPICKABLE;
00209                 setPart("pickStyle",pickStyle);
00210         }
00211 }
